content.name: Atlanta Journal-Constitution
bullets: Rebuilt AJC’s site using React components as part of their integration with ARC XP - a cloud-based CMS developed by Amazon.
Remedied bugs, implemented site metrics tracking, and developed interactive features using React hooks for sites that receive thousands of unique visitors a day.
Collaborated with QA, Product Owners, and Project Managers in discussing new features, JIRA tickets, and existing bugs.
Worked closely with UX Designers in modernizing user experience and responsive interfaces for AJC and other Cox Enterprise-owned websites.
Worked in an Agile setting with daily stand-ups and sprint retrospectives.

content.name: Capgemini Sogeti
bullets: Developed and styled landing page, dashboards, and other UI components using Angular, TypeScript, and SASS on a enterprise Spring Boot application for a cable television company.
Collaborated with onshore and offshore teams in identifying and resolving issues within the application.
Worked closely with Lead UX Designer in identifying imporvements for UI elements and implementing solutions.

content.name: Pixel Smash
content.desc: Platform Fighting game powered where you win by knocking your opponent off stage.
bullets: Designed and programmed all combat mechanics for fast paced action
Spearheaded the creation of the CPU combat logic for ‘player vs computer’ battling in single-player mode.
Designed the Sound Test feature that show-cased music from the game.

content.name: ResumeGen
bullets: Personal resume generator complete with downloadable PDF - built with Node and React

content.name: Ad-Vision
bullets: Developing all text, meshes, and particle emitter components that would render when triggered by an image marker.
Created reusable classes for ViroReact’s particle system that streamlined SFX development
Constructed chained animations that brought the 3D components to life and greatly improved the user experience.
Utilized: JavaScript, ViroReact AR, React Native, Node, Express, Google Cloud Vision

content.name: Georgia Institute of Technology
bullets: Designed, developed, and deployed numerous robust web applications utilizing front and back-end technologies such as MongoDB, Express, React, and Node (MERN Stack).
Developed applications that were awarded “Most Creative” and “Best UI/UXDesign”

content.name: University of Georgia
bullets: BBA in Risk Management and Insurance, May 2016.

content: Javascript (React, Node, jQuery), Git, React Native, HTML5, CSS/SASS, GraphQL, SQL (MySQL), AR (ViroReact), Netlify, Firebase
